About Me

I am currently a (Central) Banker. Because of the 2020 pandemic, I started a podcast with my friend Fira on Spotify named Podcast FnB: Podcast Fira dan Bimo. The podcast has 2 season (a total of 41 episodes). I am also doing Voice-Over work that you can see here .

In 2021, I started exploring the popular video sharing app Tiktok and gained more than 90k followers there. You can visit the tiktok profile here (Tiktok @squillliams)

Since 2018, I tried to consistently log my movies and books activity. I am also open to any books and movies/series recommendation.

You can also read my general blog at tentangbimo, and sometimes I upload videos to my youtube channel

Stay healthy, and stay safe!

@squillliams
